creditline: Gift of Ruth and David Waterbury
description: urn with lid; brown, black, and white; urn has four pairs of vertical white stripes curved together at top and bottom; lid has eight black and white stripes, a thin pointed white finial, and a wide white band at the bottom
markings: on bottom of urn, on sticker: [97-53]
medium: Lacewood, Indian rosewood, holly, pink ivory wood, ebony, bone
signed: on bottom of urn, in black: [Michael Mode \'97-57]
title: Jehan's Gift
